name: IdentityDrawer
summary: A delightful component for Journey's complete identity and securty system
description:
This drop-in solution handles the UI flows for verifying identity with driver's license scans, facial authentication/enrollment, device biometrics, ssn, document signatures, and other [Journey Secure Pipelines](https://journeyid.com/).

The Identity Drawer can be easily customized to fit in with the rest of your app's visual style.
